app.title: Arknights: Endfield Production Calculator
app.subtitle: Plan Your Factory
app.no_recipe_message: No production recipe found for this item.
app.meta_description: Free online production calculator for Arknights: Endfield. Plan your factory chains, calculate resource requirements, and optimize power consumption.

help.title: How to Use
steps: Use the search bar to find and select an item you want to produce.
Enter the desired production rate (items per minute).
Click "Calculate" to generate the production chain.
Drag nodes to rearrange the graph.
Click and drag on the background to pan the view.
Scroll to zoom in and out.
Click on a machine's recipe to switch between alternatives.
help.note: P.S. If you have some bugs try reload page with Ctrl+F5. If it doesn't work send issue to bilzebuba at Discord or Telegram.

delete_confirmation.title: Confirm Deletion
delete_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to delete "" and all its unique ingredient chains?
